articles.title: Kiara Advani’s Indoo Ki Jawani to release in theatres on December 11, 2020 - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Kiara Advani-starrer Indoo Ki Jawani will release in theatres in December this year. The film features Kiara as a feisty girl from Ghaziabad whose left and right swipes on dating app lead to hilarious consequences.
